Dear team, kindly requesting password for the Tanagra Atlantis CCTV footage because the customer damaged one of the Lalique items by mistake on September 11 between 10 pm and 10:15 pm. we need the footage from this accident to report to the office. Please let us know if it is possible to share the password or you can provide a footage for us.

 

Alternately, click here <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Frso.e-mac.com%2F%2Fpages%2FManageGenericForm.aspx%3FfrmGuid%3D08186535-69af-b973-a32c-197688b5b9f2&data=05%7C02%7CHagop.Ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Ccc928fbb9b99470022ae08dcdca29cd2%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638627838271721339%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=oeqFYjn%2FbfJj3aJZd8JUqs7BXtbHWgwvaapleI5mm94%3D&reserved=0>  to review it on RSO.

This is an auto-generated email, please do not reply.
